contentrichtext.text: '''RPL''' is an [[initialism]] for: ==Sports== * [[Right posterolateral|R]]<nowiki/>ezgateway Premier League. ==Medicine== * [[Right posterolateral]] branch of the [[right coronary artery]] * [[Radiophotoluminescence dosimeter]] - a device for measuring [[absorbed dose]] * Recurrent Pregnancy Loss - a term describing [[habitual abortion]] ==Other uses== * [[Recognition of prior learning]], a process used by colleges and universities around the world to evaluate learning acquired outside the classroom for the purpose of assigning academic credits * [[Ramped Powered Lighter]] - a type of landing craft formerly operated by the Royal Corps of Transport of the British Army * [[Realtime Programming Language]] * [[Reciprocal Public License]] * [[Recurrent Pregnancy Loss]] - recurrent [[miscarriages]] * [[Remote Initial Program Load]], a network boot protocol. There are two such protocols with the same name - IBM-style (also known as Microsoft) and Novell-style * [[Requester Privilege Level]], in computer science * Res Publica Litterarum : studies in the classical tradition - an academic journal * Rhapsody Play List, a playlist format for [[Rhapsody (online music service)]] * [[Reverse Polish LISP]], a programming language for calculators * [[rpl]], Un*x Text Replacement Utility * [[Russian Premier League]] - the highest level professional [[association football]] league in [[Russia]] * [[Richmond Public Library]], in British Columbia, Canada. * [[Routing Protocol for Low power and Lossy Networks]] mesh routing protocol (ietf-roll-rpl) * [[Repetitive Flight Plan]] {{disambig}}
